William Charles Schwartz (April 22, 1884 â€“ August 29, 1961) was a Major League Baseball first baseman who played for one season. He played for the Cleveland Naps for 24 games during the 1904 Cleveland Naps season. He coached the Southern Association Nashville Vols from 1911 to 1915.
